text:
Hi guys
I have a yearly membership workflow,
I do a renewal reminder with this workflow for membership that are expired in 30 days
What will be a good tool to make sure a contact will be enrolled to this workflow every time heâ€™s membership is expired in 30 day?

some more context:

i have a 31 days workflow, built on stages:
1 - all contacts with 31 days to get expired are enrolled
2 - they get 30 days notice, and wait in the work flow for another 17 days
3 - they get 14 days notice and wait for another 7 days
4 - they get the last notice

total of 3 notices,

my question is how can i stop or supress email to go out in a apecific time of the week (shabbat)?
